metadata.title: CVE-2014-9494 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description:
RabbitMQ before 3.4.0 allows remote attackers to bypass the loopback_usersrestriction via a crafted X-Forwareded-For header.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-9494` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

rabbitmq-server - 3.2.4-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: rabbitmq-server package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.2.4-1').
